scripts.build-debug: mkdir -p target && npm run -s cargo-build > ./target/out.ndjson && npm run -s copy-artifacts
scripts.build-release: mkdir -p target && npm run -s cargo-build-release > ./target/out.ndjson && npm run -s copy-artifacts
scripts.build-all: mkdir -p target && npm run -s cargo-build -- --workspace > ./target/out.ndjson && npm run -s copy-artifacts
